short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch your favourite shows in a pop-up while you multitask

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Picture-in-picture Video Player - Full Control Over Your Video Playback.

Watch your favourite shows as a pop-up, while you multitask. 
Control video playback speed, pause/play, skip, mute/unmute, and more on any website.

Picture-in-picture Video Player is a powerful and intuitive tool designed to give you full control over HTML5 video playback on any website and on Picture-in-Picture (PiP) Mode too. Whether you're watching videos for entertainment, education, or tutorials, this extension allows you to adjust playback speed, and control video behavior.

Key Features:

Picture-in-Picture (PiP) Mode: Watch videos in a small floating window while browsing other parts of the website. Draggable and resizable.

Adjust Video Speed: Change the playback speed by using a simple slider.

Pause/Play Button: Pause or resume the video directly from the extension without navigating back to the video player.

Mute/Unmute: Instantly mute or unmute the video, without affecting other audio on the page.

Compatibility: The extension works seamlessly with most HTML5 video players, including popular platforms like YouTube, Vimeo, and educational sites.

Take full control of your video experience with Picture-in-picture Video Player and enjoy videos at your pace, whether you're speeding up to save time or slowing down to understand details better.
